divs: sighting detailsmy family thinks that i'm crazy since i've been such a big ufo enthusiast for a long time... but i swear i'm not making this up and i am in no way mistaken for what i've seen. in the past couple of months i have seen approximately 3 different ufo's in the sky. two during the day and this latest one at night. i usually stargaze at around 9 or 10 o'clock at night, contemplating the night sky and its constellations. in the east, there is a "bright star like object" which i believe to be the planet mars and i enjoy looking at it on a nightly basis. so, the other night, i went out to look at the planet and turned my gaze to the east. i believed that i had found it! it was a very bright star-like object in the night sky in the eastern direction, however, this object appeared to move just as i turned my eyes to it. i rubbed my eyes thinking that my mind was playing tricks on me. but to my utter amazement, the star-like object began traveling, mostly in a straight line fashion but with some movement to the right and left, slowly (well, really at a very medium pace) moving through the night sky from the east traveling over the sky heading west. there were absolutely no blinking lights, this was not a plane! i live close to several airports and see planes in the skies often. in fact, the day before this incident, a black military helicopter was traversing the neighborhood skies. like i said, this object looked just like a very bright star in the sky, only it moved and flew through the sky heading west from the eastern direction. i was utterly amazed by what i witnessed and this was the 3rd ufo sighting that i've had in the past 2 months. the other two happened during the day. the first was around 4pm and resembled a sailors hat... it was like a white football that just sort of floated thru the sky, again, heading in the eastern\north eastern direction. i ran inside to get a camera but there was no film inside. about a week later, i noticed that the birds were acting strangely and flying out of formation. that's when i noticed a black, round "ball" flying level through the sky. at first i believed it to be a bird that was just flying at a weird angle, giving the impression of a sphere or a "ball", however, it did not fly like a bird at all! never once did it "swoop" up or down, but remained level going across and through the sky, always remaining this black spheroid shaped object! that's when the strangest thing happened... when it passed in front of the sun, you could easily detect that the object was metal!! so i yelled for my brother and by the time he got outside, the object was much farther off in the distance, but i pointed it out to him and told him what i'd seen, but since he couldn't see the object for what it was, he simply brushed it off as my "overactive imagination". granted i suppose it may have been something other than an alien craft, but it was no bird and it was no plane!! i've no idea why all of a sudden i've seen 3 ufo's in the past 2 months or so, whereas before i hadn't ever truly seen one... but i assure you of what i saw. if the other two were something else, a case of mistaken identity, i am 100% positive of the star like object that i saw go across the sky the other night.
Summary: A Bright "Star-like" object which moved relatively medium-paced over the sky from the East to the West
